anya-e0806n0:61_40: sadde ca visesito hotīti saddalakkhaṇasaddo māgadhe eva saddeeva (potthake) byavacchedito hoti,
anya-e0806n0:61_41: ayametthādhippāyo ‘magadhesu viditā māgadhāti sadde gahetvā tesamidaṁ māgadhanti māgadhasaddena yasmā saddalakkhaṇasadde lakkhaṇaṁ visesitaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:61_42: tasmā saddalakkhaṇasadde saddo yadi amāgadho kathaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ māgadhaṁ siyāti sāmatthiyā saddopi visesito hotī’ti,
anya-e0806n0:61_43: nanu māgadhanti lakkhaṇassa māgadha saddasambandhittajhāpanato saddalakkhaṇanti ettha saddasaddassa niratthaka tāpatti hotīti,
anya-e0806n0:61_44: na hoti gammamānatthassa saddassa payogampati kāmacārattā saddalakkhaṇasaddassa vā samāsatthe niruḷhattā
anya-e0806n0:61_46: kopanātiādisaddalakkhaṇanti iminā abhidheyyasaṅkhātapayojanassa dassitattā tappayojanapucchanaparā codanā,
anya-e0806n0:62_0: Piyo ca garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e0806n0:64_0: Vuttehi tato parehi ca pasatthatarehi guṇavisesehi samupetaṁ guruṁ.
anya-e0806n0:67_3: sussūsā sakkaccasippapaṭiggahaṇehi sammā upaṭṭhahantena savana,uggahana- dhāraṇa-
anya-e0806n0:67_5: bhāvanā hi kaṅkhāvicchedaṁ katvā viññātabbaṁ saddalakkhaṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:67_8: so ‘dhammavinayesu kusalo na hotī’ti ettha daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n0:67_10: tattha dhammavinayesu suttantātābhidhammasaṅkhātesu dhammesu ceva vinaye ca, kasmā–
anya-e0806n0:68_0: Yo niruttiṁ na sikkheyya, sikkhanto piṭakattayaṁ;
anya-e0806n0:70_1: ayametthādhippāyo “yathā vuttanayena sambhūtapada byāmohavasena padatthepi byāmohasambhavato suttantopadassitāya
anya-e0806n0:70_2: diṭṭhiviniveṭṭhanāya ca abhidhammāgate nāmarūpaparicchede ca vinaya niddiṭṭhe saṁvarāsaṁvare ca akosallaṁ siyā”ti,
anya-e0806n0:70_6: paṭipajjitumasakkontoti tatthatattheva vuttāsu adhisīla adhicitta adhipaññāsikkhāsu pavattituṁ asamattho,
anya-e0806n0:71_0: Yāva tiṭṭhanti suttantā, vinayo yāva dippati;
anya-e0806n0:72_0: Tāva dakkhanti ālokaṁ, sūriye abbhuggate yathāti.
anya-e0806n0:73_0: Paṭipattinti paṭipajjīyatīti paṭipattīti yathāvuttaṁ tividhampi paṭipattiṁ,
anya-e0806n0:73_2: nassati hi paṭipatti tesuyevā ko sallatamagatattā,
anya-e0806n0:75_0: Tamo bhavissati loke, sūriye atthaṅgate yathāti.
anya-e0806n0:76_2: nukkamapariccāgena anurūpapaṭipattiyā paṭilabhitabbattā adhigamavisayassa visathattā (potthake) yo gakkhemassa,
anya-e0806n0:77_0: Suttante rakkhite sante, paṭipatti hoti rakkhitā;
anya-e0806n0:78_0: Paṭipattiyaṁ ṭhito dhīro, yogakkhemā na dhaṁsatīti.
anya-e0806n0:79_0: Etāvatā aviññātasaddalakkhaṇassa sakatthaparihāniṁ dassetvā idāni sakatthasampattimūlikā paratthasampattīti
anya-e0806n0:79_1: tadabhāvā tādiso puggalo paresampi paccayo bhavituṁ na sakkotīti dassetuṁ ‘nacā’tiādi vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:79_3: tañcettha tesaṁ tesaṁ kula puttānaṁ dhammavinayasikkhāpanaṁ taṁtaṁ kammato nittharaṇādi ca,
anya-e0806n0:79_8: idha pana taṁ sādhanabhūto puggalo upacārato patiṭṭhāti gahetabbo,
anya-e0806n0:79_10: saddalakkhaṇaññūyevāti avadhāraṇampana tesu tabbidūyeva samatthoti dassanatthaṁ pakaraṇavasena vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:79_11: attano pana suguttasīlakkhandhavirahena kadāci koci yathāvuttānaṁ patiṭṭhābhavituṁ na sakkoti…
anya-e0806n0:79_13: teneva vinayadhare ānisaṁsaṁ dassentena bhagavatā tappadhānaṁ tappamukhaṁva katvā “pañcime bhikkhave ānisaṁsā vinayadhara puggale,
anya-e0806n0:79_14: katame pañca attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti su rakkhito,
anya-e0806n0:79_25: atha khoti vidho saddhammopi nāsitoyevāti vatthumāha ‘ajānanto panā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:79_26: ayathāpaṭipajjamānoti saddalakkhaṇaññunā yathā yena pakārena atthānurūpaṁ byañjane byañjanānurūpañca atthe paṭipajjitabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:79_32: terasa dhutaguṇā cuddasa khandhakavattāni dve asīti mahāvattānīti ayaṁ paṭipattisaddhammo nāma,
anya-e0806n0:79_33: cattāro maggā cattāri ca phalāni ayaṁ adhigamasaddhammo nāma,
anya-e0806n0:79_41: vākyaṁ athavā pajjate gamyate attho etenāti padaṁ-
anya-e0806n0:79_45: dunnikkhittaṁ duṭṭhu nikkhittaṁ ṭhapitaṁ virādhetvā kathitaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:79_46: attho ca dunnītoti dunnikkhittattāyeva padabyañjanassa tabbacanīyopi duṭṭhuviññāto hoti,
anya-e0806n0:79_49: na hi attāva attanā veditabboti yuttanti.
anya-e0806n0:80_0: Tadevantiādinā yathāvuttaṁ nigametvā saññāvidhāne payojanaṁ dasseti,
anya-e0806n0:80_2: yasmā saddalakkhaṇassa jānanaṁsāni saṁsaṁ tasmāti attho,
anya-e0806n0:80_7: Nanuca saññīnaṁ saññānaṁ vattabbatte “aādayo titālīsavaṇṇā”tiādīnaṁ vākyānaṁ visuṁvisuṁ mahantattā kuto
anya-e0806n0:80_8: lāghavaṁ satthassāti maññamāno ‘tathāhi’ccādinā saññāvidhāne lāghavasabbhāvaṁ samattheti,
anya-e0806n0:80_9: hotevāti avadhāraṇena katthaci parasatthe viya no na hotīti dasseti,
anya-e0806n0:80_12: 24) vaṇṇādisaññāsamuddharitā nāttānamattāvagametumalanti pare pucchitvā jānitabbā assa,
anya-e0806n0:80_14: tatossa saññāti saññāsaññīvivecanaṁ tadanuṭṭhānanti paramparāpekkhāya bhavitabbaṁ paṭipatti gāravābhāvā.
anya-e0806n0:80_19: visayo gocaro yatthete syādayo vidhī yante,
anya-e0806n0:80_21: paṭhamaṁ karīyatīti pakati yato syādayo vidhīyante,
anya-e0806n0:80_28: samānattantuṇādivuttiyā “rājādivisiṭṭhe purisā doviya’vasiṭṭhādivisiṭṭhe apaccādimhi atthe pavattanato.
